metadata.title: CVE-2024-1283 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Heap buffer overflow in Skia in Google Chrome prior to 121.0.6167.160allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
